content.description:
Consider the following code segment. 
 double result = Math.abs(x);
content.question: Which of the following statements about the variable x is true?

choices.label: x may hold any numerical value.
x must have a value greater than 0.
x must have a value less than 0.

content.answer: x may hold any numerical value.

skill.text: 4.B: Describe the initial conditions that must be met for a code segment to work as intended or described.
